hero.description: We are specialists in hot runner systems and plastic injection solutions, offering high-quality products and specialized technical support.

products_page.title: Mastip Products
products_page.description: Complete solutions in hot runner systems

hot_halves_systems.title: Mastip Hot Half Systems
hot_halves_systems.description: Complete hot runner systems for all applications

standard.title: Standard Hot Half Systems
standard.description: Complete hot runner systems designed for efficiency and reliability

specialty.title: Specialty Hot Half Systems
specialty.description: Customized solutions for specific and challenging applications

temperature_controllers.title: Mastip Temperature Controllers
temperature_controllers.description: High precision temperature controllers for hot runner systems

touchscreen.title: Touchscreen Temperature Controllers
features: Precise temperature control for multiple zones
Connectors for mold-power, thermocouple, and valve gate control cables at the rear

specs.Power: 3-phase 4-wire Y / Δ type (200-240Vac) or 3-phase 5-wire Y type (380-415Vac)

modular.title: Modular Temperature Controller
modular.description: Expandable modular system for temperature control in large-scale applications
features: Compatibility with most leading hot runner brands
Closed-loop power distributor and temperature controlling system
Built-in cooling fans and circuit breakers
Comprehensive warning system including fuse blowout, overload, thermocouple open/reverse, temperature, heater fault, high load

specs.Safety: Circuit breakers and comprehensive warning system

integrated.title: Integrated Temperature Controller
integrated.description: Integrated temperature control solution for hot runner systems
features: Multiple alarms including fuse break, overload, thermocouple, temperature, and heating element fault

sequential_controllers.title: Mastip Sequential Controllers
sequential_controllers.description: Sequential controllers for valve gate systems

sc2.title: MetiCom SC2
sc2.description: Compact sequential controller for up to 2 valves
features: Individual opening and closing control for each valve

specs.Operation Modes: Mode A, Mode B, Mode C

sc8.title: MetiCom SC8
sc8.description: Advanced sequential controller for up to 8 valves

manifolds_available.title: Mastip Manifold Systems
manifolds_available.description: Balanced and special manifolds for plastic injection

standard.title: Balanced Manifolds
standard.description: High-quality and precise manifolds for resin distribution

nozzles.title: Mastip Injection Nozzles
nozzles.description: High-performance nozzles for plastic injection applications

mx.title: MX Nozzle Series
mx.description: Ideal for small to medium applications, designed for multi-cavity systems and hot halves.
features: Processes a wide range of plastics

bx.title: BX Nozzle Series
bx.description: Cost-effective solutions for low to medium cavity applications, not requiring hot half construction.

sx.title: SX Nozzle Series
sx.description: Ideal for processing demanding engineering and temperature-sensitive polymers
features: Reduced inlet diameter for pressure containment
Superior alignment with injection machine nozzle
High performance for single nozzle applications

flowloc.title: FlowLocᵀᴹ Technology
flowloc.description: Leak-proof solution for multi-cavity manifold systems with advanced heating technology.
features: Ideal for Nexusᵀᴹ and VeriShotᵀᴹ systems

multigate.title: Multi-Gate Solutions
multigate.description: Engineered for challenging applications requiring close pitch gates in restricted areas.
features: Highly conductive alloy for excellent thermal profile

valve_gates.title: Mastip Valve Gate Technology
valve_gates.description: Advanced valve gate systems for plastic injection

cylix.title: Cylix Hybrid Valve Gates
cylix.description: Pneumatic or hydraulic valve gate actuation for high glass-filled and large shot applications.
features: Compatibility with MX, BX, and TX nozzles

mvg25.title: Compact Valve Gates
mvg25.description: Ideal for small to medium applications requiring close cavity, high speed, sequential filling, or highly cosmetic gates.
features: Simple mounting in the backplate with integral airways

mvg40.title: Mini Valve Gates
mvg40.description: Ideal for high speed, simultaneous or sequential filling, or highly cosmetic gates. Produces faster cycle times, improved part strength and appearance with increased dimensional stability. Operates with demanding materials including filled materials.
features: High speed and simultaneous or sequential filling

mvg55.title: Multi-Tip Valve Gates
mvg55.description: Ideal for medium to large shot weight applications requiring simultaneous or sequential filling, or cosmetic gates.
features: Simple mounting in the backplate with integral airways
Sequential filling and weld line management

nexus.title: Nexusᵀᴹ Valve Gates
nexus.description: Next generation valve gates with Cylix Hybrid Actuation and FlowLocᵀᴹ Technology.

verishot.title: VeriShotᵀᴹ Single Valve Gate System
verishot.description: Compact valve gates with advanced heating technology for high-quality parts
features: Processes a wide range of polymers
High-temperature seals and adjustable valve pins

cae.title: Mastip CAE Services
cae.description: Computer-aided engineering services for plastic injection

thermal.title: Thermal Analysis
thermal.description: Advanced thermal analysis for mold design optimization

flow.title: Flow Analysis
flow.description: Flow analysis for resin distribution optimization

16_channels.description: 16 injection points, designed for the efficient production of high-precision technical parts.

24_channels.title: 24-Channel System
24_channels.description: 24 injection points, ideal for continuous and consistent manufacturing of packaging-related parts.

32_channels.title: 32-Channel System
32_channels.description: 32 injection points, developed to meet the demands of the civil engineering industry with high efficiency.

64_channels.title: 64-Channel System
64_channels.description: 64 injection points, designed for large-scale production with high dimensional precision and advanced thermal control.

about.title: About Us
about.description: Vonic Systems is a company specialized in hot runner systems, offering complete solutions for the plastic injection industry.
about.commitment: Committed to innovations that enhance plastic injection processes
about.text: We use exclusive logical technology that allows us to improve the efficiency of plastic production. Our technology comes from years of experience, listening to typical molding problems and constantly coming up with SOLUTIONS. We can help your company with new or existing projects to become more efficient than you are today!
